entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
